name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AutoSkippy | Skip Intros, Ads, Recaps & Next Episode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skip intros, ads, recaps and next episode in Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, Disney+, Crave and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your streaming experience with AutoSkippy! This Chrome extension makes binge-watching effortless by automatically skipping intros, ads, recaps, and advancing to the next episode. Say goodbye to repetitive clicks and enjoy uninterrupted streaming with just a toggle.

Key Features:
1. Automatic Intros Skip: Effortlessly skips intro screens on Netflix, Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, Disney+, Crave and other platforms.
2. Ad Skipping: Automatically skips ads on YouTube and more.
3. Recap Skipping: Eliminate recap screens to dive straight into the next episode.
4. Next Episode Button: Automatically advances to the next episode without manual clicks.
5. Sleek Design: Features a stylish toggle button with interactive indicators.
6. Privacy First: Operates securely within streaming platforms while keeping your data private.

How to Use:
1. Toggle AutoSkippy on.
2. Open Netflix, YouTube, Crave, Prime Video or other supported platforms and start watching.
3. Relaxâ€”AutoSkippy will handle the rest!
